cleaned_text: Seeing the Invisible There's a war happening right now for the free will of humanity. Our freedom of thought, freedom of intuition, and freedom of choice are all under aggressive attack. But the battles are being fought on the subconscious, psychological, psychic, and spiritual levels of reality. As a result, many people don't know what's happening. The good news? There's never been a better time to activate your spiritual immune system — the innate part of you that rejects cultural illusion and identifies the truth. Just like your physical immune system rejects foreign substances and engages intricate healing processes, your spiritual immune system rejects social conditioning, propaganda, and other fear-based control tactics. It orchestrates healing processes not only within yourself, but within the world at large. It's time to reactivate our spiritual immune systems, awaken our intuition, and regain our self trust! Fortunately, some are born with spiritual immune systems that sooner or later give rejection to the illusory worldview grafted upon them from birth through social conditioning.
